org.eclipse.smarthome.core.audio

Class FileAudioStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • org.eclipse.smarthome.core.audio.AudioStream
        • org.eclipse.smarthome.core.audio.FixedLengthAudioStream
          • org.eclipse.smarthome.core.audio.FileAudioStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    @NonNullByDefault
public class FileAudioStream
extends FixedLengthAudioStream
    This is an AudioStream from an audio file
    Author:
    Karel Goderis - Initial contribution, Kai Kreuzer - Refactored to take a file as input, Christoph Weitkamp - Refactored use of filename extension
